document_data.name: Niwa Sutai
document_data.mainbody: '''Niwa Sutai''' was a [[samurai]] member of the [[Niwa clan]] and overseer of [[Kabe]] in [[Kozakura]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: In Kabe, he led a company of four samurai and ten [[bushi]]. He also commanded two warships, each with ten sailors and fifteen bushi. All these armed men upset the villagers, who needed to provide food for Sutai and all his men.
document_data.Relationship: Sutai was the nephew of [[Niwa Hirotada]] and the great-great-grandson of the great [[Niwa Ozuchi]], who saved the charters of the Niwa line.
